掩.definition: to cover up; to conceal; to close (a door, book etc); (coll.) to get (one's fingers etc) caught when closing a door or lid; (literary) to launch a surprise attack

掩人耳目.definition: to fool people (idiom); to pull the wool over people's eyes

掩卷.definition: (literary) to close the book (after a reading session)

掩映.definition: hidden from view; alternately hidden and visible; setting off each other

掩殺.definition: to make a surprise attack; to pounce on (an enemy)

掩耳盜鈴.definition: lit. to cover one's ears whilst stealing a bell; to deceive oneself; to bury one's head in the sand (idiom)

掩蓋.definition: to conceal; to hide behind; to cover up

掩護.definition: to screen; to shield; to cover; protection; cover; CL:面[mian4]

掩面而泣.definition: to bury one's head in one's hands and weep (idiom)

掩飾.definition: to cover up; to conceal; to mask; to gloss over
